SEARCH
Package org.jarzarr.assets

Class Animation

java.lang.Object
org.jarzarr.assets.Animation
public class Animation extends Object
Time-based sprite animation.

Animation advances frames based on elapsed time (dt) and a fixed frames-per-second value. Supports optional looping.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates an animation with the given FPS and frames.

  • Constructor Details

    • Animation

      public Animation(double fps, BufferedImage... frames)
      Creates an animation with the given FPS and frames.
      Parameters:
      fps - frames per second (must be > 0 for meaningful behavior)
      frames - frame images in playback order

  • Method Details

    • setLoop

      public void setLoop(boolean loop)
      Sets whether the animation loops when it reaches the final frame.
      Parameters:
      loop - true to loop, false to clamp to last frame

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets playback to the first frame and clears internal timing.

    • update

      public void update(double dt)
      Advances animation time and updates the current frame if enough time has passed.
      Parameters:
      dt - delta time in seconds

    • buildRowAnim

      public static Animation buildRowAnim(SpriteSheet sheet, int row, int cols, double fps)
      Convenience builder for a row-based animation from a SpriteSheet. Reads tiles (0..cols-1) from a single row and returns an animation.
      Parameters:
      sheet - sprite sheet
      row - row index (0-based)
      cols - number of columns/frames to read from that row
      fps - frames per second
      Returns:
      constructed row animation

    • frame

      public BufferedImage frame()
      Returns the current frame image (no copy).
      Returns:
      current frame
